data.eml:eml: Micropezidae (Diptera, Nerioidea) of Mauritius, with a description of Paraeurybata new genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marshall, S. A. (2019): Micropezidae (Diptera, Nerioidea) of Mauritius, with a description of Paraeurybata new genus. Zootaxa 4624 (4): 576-582, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4624.4.8
